title: The Honeymoon Assignment
description: LONG-LOST LOVEFor private investigators Sam Cotter and Kelley Landis, going undercover at a honeymoon resort was bittersweet torture. Three years ago, they really had been engaged. But theirs had been the wedding that never happened.Now, posing as newlyweds was all too easy. But would their rediscovered passion be able to withstand the light of day? Only time would tell - and time was something that was quickly running out for Sam and Kelley...Assignment: ROMANCE -- Watch out women! Because when the Cotter brothers take on a case, it's hearts that are in danger...
author: Cathryn Clare
